description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Aliens try to invade the planets of our solar system. You are our last hope, fight them back! Show your fighting skill in various environments and help to save earth in this arcade shooter.
description.short: Aliens try to invade the planets of our solar system. You are our last hope, fight them back! Show your fighting skill in various environments and help to save earth in this arcade shooter.
